name: Out of Body (itch) (Reil)
description:
It's a quick little experiment with different 3rd person POV methods in VR. Also with a quick, imitation-Fortnite building method!

POVs:

  • Standard first person
  • Over-the-shoulder
  • Overhead/Top-down
  • Fixed camera view

Controls:

  • Movement
    • Left analog input: Walk
    • Right analog input: Rotate
  • Left main button: Toggle Camera (Fixed camera mode only)
  • Grip buttons: Grab an item.
  • Building
    • Right grip: Turn on building mode (release to turn off building mode)
    • Left and right triggers: Rotate item
    • Right main button: Build item
    • Right secondary button: Change item (Wall, floor, ramp)
